response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and is worth $1,200,000 to me personally. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price, reflecting my confidence in its worth and your potential appreciation for it. I kindly request your consideration for the following offer: $950,000. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 950000}
